Origins: In March 2014, the Cream Bmp Daily web site published an article positing that George Zimmerman, the man charged (and ultimately acquitted) in the fatal shooting of teenager Trayvon Martin in February 2012, had accidentally shot and killed himself while loading a gun:
Description: Soon afterwards links and excerpts referencing this item were being circulated via social media, with many of those who encountered it mistaking it for a genuine news article. However, this item was just a spoof as noted in Cream Bmp Daily 's " About " page, that web site deals strictly in satire: CreamBmp.com Written by comedian CREAM. This website is comprised of satire and parody of current news and urban culture. For entertainment purposes only.
Example: [Collected via Facebook, March 2014] I just saw on facebook that George Zimmerman accidentally shot himself.
Claim: George Zimmerman accidentally shot and killed himself while loading a gun.
